unnormalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment, eh? Like leaving your paani puri half-eaten! Did the checkout page ask for your kundali or something? Don't be shy, yaar! Finish the transaction! I know that Rs. 299 saree from Fabindia is calling your name. Come on back before 17/06/2024, 14:30 hrs! Maybe check your bank balance first? Deadline is 20/06/2024, 18:00 hrs though. Think of the compliments from Auntie Shanti! Quick, before someone else snaps it up at 09:00 hrs!
normalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment, eh? Like leaving your paani puri half-eaten! Did the checkout page ask for your kundali or something? Don't be shy, yaar! Finish the transaction! I know that rupee two hundred and ninety nine saree from Fabindia is calling your name. Come on back before seventeenth june two thousand and twenty four, fourteen thirty hours!
